meaningMnemonic: You have <radical>fins</radical> in <radical>private</radical>. But, you want the world to see them, so you take them <kanji>public</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You head out into the <kanji>public</kanji> where everyone can see your fins, but... things have changed. All people are the same. There are thousands of <reading>こう</reading>いちs walking around, and they all stare at you (though they pretend like they aren't).
